title: Returned choice is wrong
comment: The choice before this is the index into the board array, but you need to add 1 in order to show the play to the user.

title: Explain variable
comment: Shoud explain what the variable is for. Apparently holds the choice for blocking opponent if no winning move is found.

title: Not doing as expected
comment: Code here should check if this 'win line' is achieved, but fails to do so. Not clear what is trying really. Possibly you want something like:\n if tuple(map(lambda n: brd[n], w)) == (xo, xo, xo); break

title: Not doing as expected
comment: Just like above but with 'ox' instead of 'xo'

title: Better choice than random
comment: If position 5 is available it should take it instead of random.
